column5: Tony made me do it ...............okay, maybe he didn't.
He also aked to PM her.......I did...I celebrate my b-day there every year.......Chuck...
Who wouldn't want to spend their BD at Lakair among fifty of their closest friends they've never met???  I went up for the day on my Birthday last year.  Definitely worth it.  Maureen

Exactly, what better way to spend your birthday than in the beautiful outdoors away from the hustle and bustle of the city.  She says, it's just a bunch of old men sitting in boats all day  It's either Lakair or the weigh-in for the Scotty tournament dear, I think you'll have more fun at Lakair.  Tony  P.S. I'm going to get punched in the arm
Interesting how this post keeps bumping to the top over and over again with nobody repying to it for over 5 hours ........ Thats about 5 times now
It's being bumped each time someone votes.  It's an admin option Lew.  Rick or one of the other admins can disable 'bumping' by vote in polls.
I'm hoping to take my wife  try it Mandy, you might like it
Thanks for the explanation Raf, I didn't know how that worked.
Com'on Mandy....Lots of wimmin will be there. I'll even bring the candles to put on your Birthday fish if you'd like! LOL
don't know Mandy, but voted YES
Awww come on Mandy.  Join the gang at Lakeair. You'll love it. Tony may like it too. You'll have the greatest birthday party without lots of planning.
